dao.name: QRY_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select format_sta ,quote_rmk ,order_time from psi_quote_rf_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and ((trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) or cust_cod is null) and ((substr(order_time, 1, 1) = 'P' and substr(:period_cod, 3, 2) = 'W1') or order_time = :week or order_time is null))

dao.name: QRY_SEARCH_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select format_sta as value ,quote_rmk as display from psi_quote_rf_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod)
